description: Contains information about all the versions replication statuses applicable for Global Resiliency.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The request for the unique ID in the list of replicated bots.

parameters.name: replicaRegion
parameters.description: The request for the region used in the list of replicated bots.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The requested sort category for the list of replicated bots. The attribute of the sort category for the version replicated bots. The order of the sort category for the version replicated bots.

nested_params.name: attribute
nested_params.description: The attribute of the sort category for the version replicated bots.

nested_params.name: order
nested_params.description: The order of the sort category for the version replicated bots.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the bots in the list of replicated bots.

nested_items.name: sourceRegion
nested_items.description: The source region used for the bots in the list of replicated bots.

nested_items.name: replicaRegion
nested_items.description: The region used for the replicated bots in the list of replicated bots.

nested_items.name: botVersionReplicaSummaries
nested_items.description: The information summary used for the replicated bots in the list of replicated bots.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The bot version for the summary information for all the version replication statuses.

nested_items.name: botVersionReplicationStatus
nested_items.description: The version replication status for all the replicated bots.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time of the replication status for all the replicated bots.

nested_items.name: failureReasons
nested_items.description: The reasons for replication failure for all the replicated bots.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The next token used for the replicated bots in the list of replicated bots.
